articles.title: Haven't Had COVID Yet? Wanna Bet? - WebMD
articles.description: A mounting pile of scientific evidence suggests millions of Americans have been infected with the virus without ever even knowing it because they didn’t have symptoms or had mild cases they mistook for a cold or allergies.
